        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>218</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Christmas Childhood (by Patrick Kavanagh) Quiz  </string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre A Christmas Childhood (por Patrick Kavanagh)</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist – A Christmas Childhood (le Patrick Kavanagh)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Weihnachtskindheit-(durch Patrick Kavanagh) 
Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu d'enfance de Noël (par Patrick Kavanagh)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um quiz da infância do christmas (por Patrick 
Kavanagh)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un quiz di infanzia di Natale (da Patrick 
Kavanagh)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας διαγωνισμός γνώσεων παιδικής ηλικίας 
Χριστουγέννων (από τον Πάτρικ Kavanagh)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Refresh your memory Learn about poetic devices and identify them in the poem.</string>
            <string language="es">Refresca tu memoria. Aprende mecanismos poéticos e identifícalos en el poema.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cuimhne ar agus foghlaim faoi sheifteanna filíochta agus sainaithin iad sa dán.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erneuern Sie Ihren Speicher erlernen über 
poetische Einheiten und kennzeichnen sie im Gedicht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Régénérez votre mémoire se renseignent sur 
les dispositifs poétiques et les identifient dans la poésie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refresque sua memória aprendem sobre 
dispositivos poéticos e identificam-nos no poema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rinfreschi la vostra memoria imparano circa i 
dispositivi poetic e li identificano nel poem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναζωογονήστε τη μνήμη σας μαθαίνει για τις ποιητικές 
συσκευές και τις προσδιορίζει στο ποίημα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
